title: The Glove
description: A Kindle-exclusive short ghost story from Charles B. Smith, author of 1914: A Novel.At the age of eleven, a boy watches helplessly while a vile, unseen entity takes hold of his young sister, corrupting, and ultimately destroying her life. Vowing revenge, the boy sets out on a path of intellectual and scientific discovery, to uncover the strange truths buried within reality as we know it, all in the name of the vengeance he so desperately craves.
author: Charles B.  Smith
